css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d3a53e5a-u{min-width:initial;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);text-align:left;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d3a53e5a-u h1.maxi-text-block__content{color:var(--maxi-light-h1-color,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-5,0,0,0),1));font-size:80px;line-height:100%;white-space:nowrap;margin-bottom:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active
